mean_cn: adj. 矛盾的，好恶相克的
mean_en: having or showing very different feelings (such as love and hate) about someone or something at the same time
word_etyma: ambi两边 + val强 + ent形容词后缀 → ambivalent 矛盾的
sentence: I'm feeling ambivalent about whether I want wine or milk.
sentence_trans: 在选择是要牛奶还是红酒的时候，我感到很矛盾。
